SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:IF &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# NE "" : D &STRING_ARR#,string,100 : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.NORMALIZE_PATH : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
: SET &UC4RB_CHECKME# = &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS if %ISFILE% == 1 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Actions Temp Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# is a file" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.LOGGING_ERROR_PARAMETER set /a errors=1 > nul ) if %EXIST% == 0 ( md "&UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY#" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_RETURN_CODE_WINDOWS_CONSOLE ) :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_TEMP_DIRECTORY# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :ENDIF
